channel.title: What does this bit at the end mean?
channel.description:
hi all, my mate gave me some help of putting items on my server, I no how to do the coords and item ID, but what do the numbers mean at the end:
[code]AddGlobalObject(3140, 3545, 7230, -2, 10);//floor AddGlobalObject(3140, 3546, 7230, -2, 10);//floor AddGlobalObject(3140, 3547, 7230, -2, 10);//floor AddGlobalObject(3140, 3548, 7230, -2, 10);//floor AddGlobalObject(3140, 3548, 2465, 0, 10);//Portal AddGlobalObject(3144, 3548, 2466, 0, 10);//Portal AddGlobalObject(3144, 3542, 2467, 0, 10);//Portal AddGlobalObject(3140, 3542, 2468, 0, 10);//Portal[/code]
E.T.C: -2, 10); or 0, 10);
Many Thanks James

item.title: What does this bit at the end mean?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

-2 is the direction/face like north east west south and the 10 is what item it is

0 = West || -1 = North || -2 = East || -3 = South

tileObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration

Read full topic
item.source: What does this bit at the end mean?

@grafix_my_game wrote:

ok just leave the 10 and with the -2 bits that is direction they facing i forgot which is which but i hopefully sumone post them for u it would actually be a bit better if u posted the whole list so we could see everything not just some spawning parts
